text.div:
Legionellosis (Tests for Legionella species by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    38393-5 Legionella sp identified in Pleural fluid by Organism specific culture
    38394-3 Legionella sp identified in Urine by Organism specific culture
    589-2 Legionella sp identified in Bronchial specimen by Organism specific culture
    590-0 Legionella sp identified in Sputum by Organism specific culture
    593-4 Legionella sp identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    71377-6 Legionella sp [Identifier] in Isolate by Agglutination
    73671-0 Legionella pneumophila serogroup [Type] in Isolate by Agglutination
    87956-9 Legionella sp identified in Tissue by Organism specific culture
    88585-5 Legionella sp identified in Lower respiratory specimen by Organism specific culture
